thread.title: BRIEF-Luzerner Kantonalbank Q1 Net Profit CHF 50.4 Mln, +6.7%

title: BRIEF-Luzerner Kantonalbank Q1 Net Profit CHF 50.4 Mln, +6.7%
text:
April 13, 2018 / 4:40 AM / Updated 18 minutes ago BRIEF-Luzerner Kantonalbank Q1 Net Profit CHF 50.4 Mln, +6.7% Reuters Staff 
April 13 (Reuters) - Luzerner Kantonalbank AG: 
* Q1 NET PROFIT: 50.4 MILLION SWISS FRANCS, 6.7% ABOVE THE PREVIOUS YEAR 
* TARGET FOR CONSOLIDATED PROFIT FOR 2018 REMAINS UNCHANGED AT AROUND 198 MILLION FRANCS * Q1 NET INTEREST INCOME AT CHF 81.9 MILLION, DOWN 1.8% 
* Q1 NET COMMISSION INCOME INCREASED BY 2.3 MILLION FRANCS TO 23.4 MILLION FRANCS Source text - bit.ly/2Hhx449 Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
